meanings.definition: The time at which the sun rises in the morning.
meanings.sent1: Sunup is when the sky starts to get bright in the morning.
meanings.sent2: I love watching the colors of the sky change during sunup.
meanings.sent3: During sunup, the sleepy birds start to chirp and wake everyone up.
meanings.sent4: The magic of sunup is like a gentle awakening of the world.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of sunup is a daily reminder of new beginnings.

meanings.definition: The period of time around sunrise.
meanings.sent1: The air feels fresh and cool during sunup.
meanings.sent2: People often go for walks during the peaceful time of sunup.
meanings.sent3: Sunup is like a quiet whisper before the bustling day begins.
meanings.sent4: The golden hues of sunup paint the sky with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The stillness of sunup brings a sense of calm to the world.
